meanings.definition: A person or thing that integrates.
meanings.sent1: The integrants in our team work together seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: The new student was an important integrant in our class.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle piece was the missing integrant that completed the picture.
meanings.sent4: She was the integrant that brought harmony to the group.
meanings.sent5: The integrant, like a bridge, connected everyone's ideas.

meanings.definition: Elements or components that are integrated into a whole.
meanings.sent1: The integrants of the recipe blended perfectly to create a delicious dish.
meanings.sent2: The different colors were integrants in the beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: The integrants of the music band were like different instruments playing together.
meanings.sent4: Each integrant of the team contributed to the success of the project.
meanings.sent5: The integrants, like pieces of a jigsaw puzzle, fit together perfectly.
